columns.name: name
columns.description: The name of the metric filter

columns.name: log_group_name
columns.description: The name of the log group

columns.name: creation_time
columns.description: The creation time of the metric filter

columns.name: filter_pattern
columns.description: A symbolic description of how CloudWatch Logs should interpret the data in each log event

columns.name: metric_transformation_name
columns.description: The name of the CloudWatch metric

columns.name: metric_transformation_namespace
columns.description: A custom namespace to contain metric in CloudWatch. Namespaces are used to group together metrics that are similar

columns.name: metric_transformation_value
columns.description: The value to publish to the CloudWatch metric when a filter pattern matches a log event
